title: "Nowhere In Iran...": Netanyahu Issues Big Warning To "Ayatollah's Regime"
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Saturday confirmed that he personally authorised the operation to eliminate Hezbollah leader Hassan Nasrallah in Beirut.
summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Saturday confirmed that he personally authorised the operation to eliminate Hezbollah leader Hassan Nasrallah in Beirut.

title: Iran's UN Move On Hezbollah Chief Killing, US Calls It "Measure Of Justice"
content: Israel said it killed Hezbollah chief Sayyed Hassan Nasrallah in a powerful airstrike in Beirut, prompting Iran to call for the United Nations Security Council to meet over Israeli military's actions in Lebanon and across the Middle East region.
summary: Israel said it killed Hezbollah chief Sayyed Hassan Nasrallah in a powerful airstrike in Beirut, prompting Iran to call for the United Nations Security Council to meet over Israeli military's actions in Lebanon and across the Middle East region.

title: New Revelations About Princess Diana In Memoir By Her Former Hairdresser
content: Princess Diana's hairdresser has weighed in on the controversy surrounding Prince Harry and her riding instructor James Hewitt.
summary: Princess Diana's hairdresser has weighed in on the controversy surrounding Prince Harry and her riding instructor James Hewitt.

title: The Vance-Walz US Vice Presidential Debate: All You Need To Know
content: Democrat Tim Walz and Republican JD Vance will face off next week in the only scheduled US vice presidential debate, a chance for each man to reinforce his running mate's message to voters just weeks before the November 5 election.
summary: Democrat Tim Walz and Republican JD Vance will face off next week in the only scheduled US vice presidential debate, a chance for each man to reinforce his running mate's message to voters just weeks before the November 5 election.

title: If Your AI Seems Smarter, It's Thanks To Smarter Human Trainers
content: In the early years, getting AI models like ChatGPT or its rival Cohere to spit out human-like responses required vast teams of low-cost workers helping models distinguish basic facts such as if an image was of a car or a carrot.
summary: In the early years, getting AI models like ChatGPT or its rival Cohere to spit out human-like responses required vast teams of low-cost workers helping models distinguish basic facts such as if an image was of a car or a carrot.

title: "Horrified":  Ex-Harrods Owner's Son On Sex Abuse Claims Against Father
content: The son of Mohamed Al-Fayed, the late former boss of Harrods accused of sexually assaulting scores of employees, has said the allegations had "thrown into question the loving memory I had of him".
summary: The son of Mohamed Al-Fayed, the late former boss of Harrods accused of sexually assaulting scores of employees, has said the allegations had "thrown into question the loving memory I had of him".

title: "Measure Of Justice": Joe Biden On Hezbollah Chief's Killing
content: US President Joe Biden on Saturday called the killing of Hezbollah leader Hassan Nasrallah "a measure of justice for his many victims, including thousands of Americans, Israelis and Lebanese civilians."
summary: US President Joe Biden on Saturday called the killing of Hezbollah leader Hassan Nasrallah "a measure of justice for his many victims, including thousands of Americans, Israelis and Lebanese civilians."

title: 'Connectivity Clouding Sovereignty...': S Jaishankar's Veiled Dig At China

title: Storm Helene Kills 44 In US, Leaves Behind "Overwhelming" Damage
content: Millions of Americans were still without power and many faced torrential flooding on Saturday, authorities said, as powerful storm Helene rumbled across eastern and midwestern US states, leaving at least 44 people dead.
summary: Millions of Americans were still without power and many faced torrential flooding on Saturday, authorities said, as powerful storm Helene rumbled across eastern and midwestern US states, leaving at least 44 people dead.

title: SpaceX Launches Mission To Bring Back Astronauts Stuck In Space
content: SpaceX today launched a rescue mission with two passengers on board, leaving two seats empty to return the American astronauts who have been stranded for months on the International Space Station, NASA said.
summary: SpaceX today launched a rescue mission with two passengers on board, leaving two seats empty to return the American astronauts who have been stranded for months on the International Space Station, NASA said.

title: "Instills Fanaticism Among Its People": S Jaishankar's "Karma" Swipe At Pak
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar today sent a strongly-worded warning to Pakistan when he addressed the 79th United Nations General Assembly session in New York today.
summary: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar today sent a strongly-worded warning to Pakistan when he addressed the 79th United Nations General Assembly session in New York today.

title: Who Is Hashem Safieddine, Hezbollah's Possible New Leader?
content: The killing of Hezbollah leader Hassan Nasrallah in airstrikes in a Beirut suburb has put the spotlight on the man widely regarded as his heir, Hashem Safieddine.
summary: The killing of Hezbollah leader Hassan Nasrallah in airstrikes in a Beirut suburb has put the spotlight on the man widely regarded as his heir, Hashem Safieddine.

title: How The Middle East Reacted To Death Of Hezbollah Chief Hassan Nasrallah
content: Middle East nations and Hezbollah's allies in the Tehran-aligned "Axis of Resistance" reacted on Saturday to the killing of Hassan Nasrallah after the Lebanon-based armed group confirmed their leader's death in Israeli strikes.
summary: Middle East nations and Hezbollah's allies in the Tehran-aligned "Axis of Resistance" reacted on Saturday to the killing of Hassan Nasrallah after the Lebanon-based armed group confirmed their leader's death in Israeli strikes.

title: Iran's Supreme Leader Says Hezbollah Chief's Killing Will "Not Go Unavenged"
content: Iran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei said on Saturday the killing of Hezbollah leader Hassan Nasrallah would be avenged and his path in fighting Israel would be continued by other militants.
summary: Iran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei said on Saturday the killing of Hezbollah leader Hassan Nasrallah would be avenged and his path in fighting Israel would be continued by other militants.

title: "Looks Like CGI, But Is Real": Musk Shares Stunning Polaris Mission Video
content: SpaceX CEO Elon Musk today shared a stunning high-definition video of the Polaris space mission around Earth. Sharing the video highlights, Mr Musk said, "Looks like CGI (Computer-Generated Imagery), but it is real".
summary: SpaceX CEO Elon Musk today shared a stunning high-definition video of the Polaris space mission around Earth. Sharing the video highlights, Mr Musk said, "Looks like CGI (Computer-Generated Imagery), but it is real".

title: 'Ring Of Fire' Solar Eclipse: Timing, Visibility In India And Other Details
content: The annular solar eclipse of 2024 is set to occur on October 2, Wednesday. According to Space.com, during this astronomical phenomenon, the Moon will appear smaller than the Sun, leaving a bright ring of sunlight visible around the darkened centre.
summary: The annular solar eclipse of 2024 is set to occur on October 2, Wednesday. According to Space.com, during this astronomical phenomenon, the Moon will appear smaller than the Sun, leaving a bright ring of sunlight visible around the darkened centre.

title: Iran Military Unit General killed In Israeli Strike In Lebanon: Report
content: A senior general in Iran's Revolutionary Guards Corps was killed in an Israeli air strike in Lebanon alongside Hezbollah chief Hassan Nasrallah, state media reported Saturday.
summary: A senior general in Iran's Revolutionary Guards Corps was killed in an Israeli air strike in Lebanon alongside Hezbollah chief Hassan Nasrallah, state media reported Saturday.

title: Hezbollah Chief's Path "Will Continue" Despite His Killing: Iran
content: Iran's foreign ministry said Saturday the path of Hezbollah chief Hassan Nasrallah will continue despite his killing in an Israeli air strike in Beirut, after a year of cross-border clashes between the two sides.
summary: Iran's foreign ministry said Saturday the path of Hezbollah chief Hassan Nasrallah will continue despite his killing in an Israeli air strike in Beirut, after a year of cross-border clashes between the two sides.

title: Humans Could Turn Green And Lose Eyesight While Living On Mars: Biologist
content: The dream of colonising Mars appears difficult to achieve due to the brutal conditions on the planet, which experts have warned can cause people to turn green and lose their eyesight.
summary: The dream of colonising Mars appears difficult to achieve due to the brutal conditions on the planet, which experts have warned can cause people to turn green and lose their eyesight.

title: "Learnt No Lessons": Iran Supreme Leader After Hezbollah Chief's Death
content: Lashing out after the death of Hezbollah chief Hassan Nasrallah and civilians in strikes on Lebanon's Beirut, Iran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei has said the savage nature of the "rabid Zionist regime" has been revealed.
